sentences.sContent: But these methods would not be enough in the long run.
sentences.sContent_eng: But these methods would not be enough in the long run.
sentences.sCn: 但是，从长远来看，光有这些方法还是远远不够。

sentences.sContent: It has been rather costly to install the machinery, but it should pay off in the long run.
sentences.sContent_eng: It has been rather costly to install the machinery, but it should pay off in the long run.
sentences.sCn: 安装这套机械代价很高，但从长远来看它会赚钱的。

sentences.sContent: They might be annoying or frustrating at times, but in the long run, the lessons learned from them can help you become better at what you do.
sentences.sContent_eng: They might be annoying or frustrating at times, but in the long run, the lessons learned from them can help you become better at what you do.
sentences.sCn: 有时候这些问题可能会让您烦心或感到挫败，但就长远来看，从中得到的经验教训可帮助您更好地进行自己的工作。
